title: Fortunately, You Like Me Too - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Doctors   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Reporters   Timid Protagonist   Unrequited Love
author: Gu Qiao   顾桥
description:
In high school, Xu Chang was Qin Xiangnan’s nightmare.

Ten years later, he unexpectedly appeared in front of her and confessed to her.

Qin Xiangnan: How could a prideful guy like you take a fancy on me?

Xu Chang: Why? Haven’t you forgotten Shen Zhiyang?

Fortunately, you are still waiting for me. Fortunately, you also like me.

A story of a hard-working journalist woman and a handsome male doctor.>
